glsa.title: Epiphany: Untrusted search path
glsa.synopsis: An untrusted search path vulnerability in Epiphany might result in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Epiphany is a GNOME webbrowser based on the Mozilla rendering engine Gecko.

description.p: James Vega reported an untrusted search path vulnerability in the Python interface.

impact.p: A local attacker could entice a user to run Epiphany from a directory containing a specially crafted python module, resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running Epiphany.

workaround.p: Do not run "epiphany" from untrusted working directories.
